code: import{OPEN_REMINDER,CLOSE_REMINDER}from'../../actions/ui/reminder';export default function reminder(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case OPEN_REMINDER:return action.payload;case CLOSE_REMINDER:return null;default:return state;}}
